mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reply (reply_seq, reply_boardname, reply_boardseq, reply_content, reply_writer, reply_regdate) VALUES (reply_seq.nextval, 'freeboard', #{reply_boardseq}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_writer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reply SET reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_updatedate = sysdate WHERE reply_seq = #{reply_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT reply_seq, reply_boardseq, reply_content, reply_writer, reply_regdate, reply_updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE reply_boardseq = #{free_seq} ORDER BY reply_boardseq ASC
